meanings.definition: runtiest: superlative form of runty, meaning the smallest or weakest in a litter or group
meanings.sent1: The runtiest puppy in the litter struggled to keep up with its siblings.
meanings.sent2: Out of all the kittens, the runtiest one was often overlooked by potential adopters.
meanings.sent3: The runtiest chick in the nest tried to chirp the loudest to get attention.
meanings.sent4: In the forest, the runtiest sapling fought bravely to reach the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: Despite being the runtiest, the little plant grew into a beautiful flower.

meanings.definition: runtiest: having the characteristics of a runt, such as being undersized or stunted
meanings.sent1: The runtiest kitten in the litter had the tiniest paws.
meanings.sent2: The runtiest piglet in the pen was always the last to finish eating.
meanings.sent3: Even though he was the runtiest, the boy had the biggest heart.
meanings.sent4: The runtiest tree in the orchard bore the sweetest fruits.
meanings.sent5: Despite being the runtiest, the little bird soared high in the sky.
